sen.j: 切能（きりのう）とは、能において鬼・天狗・天神・雷神・龍神などがシテとなる曲。
sen.e: The Kiri Noh is one of the programs of Noh theatrical performance, when Shite (doers) performs the roles of Oni, (ogre) Tengu, (a long-nosed goblin) Tenjin, (the heavenly god) Raijin, (the god of thunder) Ryujin., etc.. (the god of dragon)

Kiri Noh is one of the programs of Noh theatrical performance, when the shite (the main actor of a Noh play) performs the roles of Oni (ogre), Tengu (a long-nosed goblin), Tenjin (the heavenly god), Raijin (the god of thunder), Ryujin (the god of dragon), etc.
sen.cmt: 他の記事と表現を統一しました。
sen.e: Kiri Noh is one of the programs of Noh theatrical performance, when the shite (the main actor of a Noh play) performs the roles of Oni (ogre), Tengu (a long-nosed goblin), Tenjin (the heavenly god), Raijin (the god of thunder), Ryujin (the god of dragon), etc.

sen.j: 五番立においては最後の五番目に演じられることから、切能または五番目物と呼ばれる。
sen.e: This program is the last, fifth performance among five Noh performances defined in the form of Noh program, therefore it is also called Kiri (cut off) Noh or Gobanme mono. (the fifth performance)
This program is the last, fifth performance among five Noh performances defined in the form of Noh program, therefore it is also called Kiri (cut off) Noh or gobanme-mono (the fifth-category play).
sen.cmt: 他の記事と表現を統一しました。
sen.e: This program is the last, fifth performance among five Noh performances defined in the form of Noh program, therefore it is also called Kiri (cut off) Noh or gobanme-mono (the fifth-category play).

sen.j: また鬼畜物とも言われる。
sen.e: It is also called "Kichiku mono." (the performance about goblins and beasts")
It is also called Kichiku-mono (the performance about goblins and beasts).
sen.cmt: ピリオドの位置を変更しました。
sen.e: It is also called Kichiku-mono (the performance about goblins and beasts).

sen.j: 『藍染川』『大江山』『鞍馬天狗』『黒塚』『殺生石』『小鍛冶』『石橋 (能)』『猩々』『土蜘蛛』『融』『鵺』『船弁慶』『紅葉狩 (能)』
sen.e: "Aizomegawa" (Aizome-River), "Oeyama" (Mt. Oe), "Kurama Tengu" (Tengu of Mt. Kurama), "Kurozuka," "Sesshoseki" (The Murder Stone), "Kokaji" (The Swordsmith Kokaji), "Shakkyo (Noh)" (Stone Bridge), "Shojo" "Tsuchigumo" (The ground-spider), "Toru" (MINAMOTO no Toru), "Nue" (Nightmare Bird), "Funa Benkei" (Benkei Aboard Ship), "Momijigari" (Viewing the Autumn Foliage)
sen.cmt: 演目名及び英訳を表記しました （定訳不明です）。
sen.e: "Aizomegawa" (Aizome-River), "Oeyama" (Mt. Oe), "Kurama Tengu" (Tengu of Mt. Kurama), "Kurozuka," "Sesshoseki" (The Murder Stone), "Kokaji" (The Swordsmith Kokaji), "Shakkyo (Noh)" (Stone Bridge), "Shojo" "Tsuchigumo" (The ground-spider), "Toru" (MINAMOTO no Toru), "Nue" (Nightmare Bird), "Funa Benkei" (Benkei Aboard Ship), "Momijigari" (Viewing the Autumn Foliage)
